attributes.action: scrape the key stage 1 SATS as teacher assessment over a period of time is more accurate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Testing children at this age is inappropriate as some children are still only 6 years of age and are vastly under developed in there motor skills and concentration. putting stress onto 6 year olds by forcing them to take tests is tantamount to mental cruelty.
